trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 與這個自動化對等相關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" /> 的快速鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key combinations for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" /> 的快速鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" /> 的類別名稱。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" /> 的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字，這段文字描述與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" /> 控制項的功能。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The text that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 文字，這段文字描述與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" /> 控制項的功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name that describes the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之項目的名稱。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The name that describes the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonToggleButtonAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之項目的描述性名稱。
